Sharjah Youth, affiliated with the Rubu’ Qarn Foundation for Creating Future Leaders and Innovators, has launched the "Winter Camp" activities from December 11 to 31.

The camp is targeted at young people aged 13 to 18 and offers a variety of activities such as sports, literature and languages, science and technology, arts, entrepreneurship workshops, field trips to tourist attractions, entertainment destinations, the "Business Stars" initiative organised by "Ruwad", and the "Dawahi11".
